wpt.name: GC2QGZ4
wpt.desc: Listen - You Smell Something? by rflester, Traditional Cache (1.5/1.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Listen - You Smell Something?
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: Located at a small community park outside of Oxford.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
Located at the Oxford Area Regional Park. The sewage treatment plant is nearby, hence the name (with a nod to Ghostbusters). This is a fairly new park just begging for a cache to be placed here. A typical cache hide, this should be an easy find for experienced and novice cachers alike. Making the find may be difficult at times - you'll see why when you get there. As always, use stealth when needed. Park is open from dawn to dusk.
A hint will be provided if DNFs start to pile up.
This cache is NOT accessible from the Rt. 1 bypass! Use the Rt. 472 exit and navigate off road from there. It appears that auto navigation won't be much good - it'll do it's best to put you on the bypass.
I've added a link to the Oxford Recreation website so that you can see the future plans they have for this area.
Congrats to $hunter for the FTF!

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Quick find on our way back home. Found with dawnie22.
